content.question: The excerpt best serves as evidence of which of the following developments?

choices.label: The termination of cultural connections with Great Britain
The popularization of the belief in human perfectibility
The creation of a unique American culture
The foundation of a trans-Atlantic print culture

content.answer: The creation of a unique American culture

topic.text: 4.9: The Development of an American Culture

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain how a specific historical development or process is situated within a broader historical context.
